title: 10 Wellness Getaways For Every Kind of Traveler
author: Lindsay Paige Stein
description: Some people travel to seek a personal transformation or spiritual awakening or to simply get away from the chaos of daily life. Whether it's trekking to the
cleaned_text: and health retreat providing the ultimate hiking-based vacation in British Columbia. With a beautiful lodge and limitless trails, Mountain Trek provides a true back-country experience, immersing guests in scenery you cannot find near most urban cities. In addition to hiking, guests are treated to an ultrapersonalized program, also spending time focusing on activities including yoga, massage therapy, detox treatments, and a variety of fitness and nutrition classes including: lectures on stress management, nutrition, sleep health, metabolism, detoxification, goal setting, and personal willpower.
